entry.name: attributeMultiple
entry.title: Multiple Attribute Selector [name="value"][name2="value2"]

argument.name: attributeFilter2
argument.desc: Another attribute filter, reducing the selection even more

argument.name: attributeFilterN
argument.desc: As many more attribute filters as necessary

entry.desc: Matches elements that match all of the specified attribute filters.

example.desc: Finds all inputs that have an id attribute and whose name attribute ends with man and sets the value.
example.html:
<input id="man-news" name="man-news" />
<input name="milkman" /> <input id="letterman" name="new-letterman" /> <input name="newmilk" />
